item.title: Sarah McLachlan on Exploring Family Challenges in Her New Single, ‘Gravity,’ and Returning to the Studio After 11 Years: ‘It Was Ridiculous to Say I’d Never Make Another Record Again’
item.description: For the last decade or so, Sarah McLachlan has been building a mystery — the mystery of when or even if she’d release newly written material. That might not have been intentional on her part, bu
